To my chagrin...
Hilarious, right?
Would you even care?
How troublesome.
Dream on darling.
Simplicity is best.
Unconditional love.
Do the impossible.
Avengers, assemble!
Anger helps no one.
Wish upon a star.
I plead the fifth.
Was that correct?
Never say never.
Cry me a river.
Punctuation is key.
Fruits are healthy.
Pump those weights.
Do you even lift?
Find three clowns.
Mother of dragons.
Valiant hero.
Tenants wanted.
We'll buy milk.
You obtained hope.
Learn a language.
